sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Name = '#[payload['Name']]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: query Account in Salesforce Instance B

batch:step.name: foreachAccountInAUpsertAccountInBStep

expression-component.doc:name: remove unnecessary fields and map field types

sfdc:upsert.doc:name: upsert Accounts in Salesforce Instance B

logger.message: The SFDC Batch job has finished: #[payload]
logger.doc:name: log 'Batch job has finished'

db:select.doc:name: query Account by matching name from Database

db:update.doc:name: update account in database
db:update.db:parameterized-query: UPDATE Account SET AccountNumber = #[payload['AccountNumber']], Description = #[payload['Description']], NumberOfEmployees = #[payload['NumberOfEmployees']], LastModifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE Name = #[payload['Name']]

db:insert.doc:name: insert account in database
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: INSERT INTO Account ( AccountNumber, Description, Name, NumberOfEmployees, SalesforceId, LastModifiedById, LastModifiedDate ) VALUES ( #[payload['AccountNumber']], #[payload['Description']], #[payload['Name']], #[payload['NumberOfEmployees']], #[payload['Id']], CURRENT_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

logger.message: The DB Batch job has finished: #[payload]
logger.doc:name: log 'Batch job has finished'
